Computerized Drug Information services .A Smith, Daniel R. .A Beauchamp, R. O. Jr. .A Garber, Josephine L. .A Daugherty, Marvel A. To compare computerized services in chemistry, pharmacology, toxicology, and clinical medicine of pharmaceutical interest, equivalent profiles were run on magnetic tape files of CA-Condensates, CBAC, Excerpta Medica, MEDLARS and Ringdoc.. The results of these searches, which covered individual chemical compounds used in pharmacology and medicine, are tabulated overlap of services, relative speed of citing references, and unique areas of journal coverage.. .X 4	1	696 65	1	696 91	1	696 120	1	696 124	1	696 127	1	696 129	1	696 162	1	696 190	1	696 191	1	696 197	2	696 211	1	696 213	1	696 214	1	696 218	1	696 243	1	696 307	1	696 330	1	696 378	1	696 381	1	696 382	2	696 421	1	696 439	1	696 440	1	696 450	1	696 451	1	696 452	1	696 459	1	696 468	1	696 484	1	696 491	1	696 492	1	696 506	3	696 508	1	696 511	1	696 512	1	696 514	1	696 518	1	696 520	1	696 523	1	696 524	1	696 525	1	696 526	2	696 529	1	696 530	1	696 534	1	696 546	1	696 553	1	696 579	1	696 580	2	696 594	1	696 603	1	696 604	1	696 606	1	696 609	2	696 610	1	696 611	1	696 612	1	696 622	1	696 623	3	696 625	1	696 626	1	696 630	1	696 634	1	696 636	1	696 637	1	696 642	1	696 648	1	696 650	1	696 676	1	696 692	1	696 696	9	696 699	1	696 703	1	696 705	4	696 708	1	696 726	1	696 727	2	696 728	2	696 729	2	696 731	1	696 732	1	696 733	1	696 734	1	696 736	2	696 738	1	696 739	1	696 740	1	696 741	1	696 742	1	696 743	1	696 744	1	696 755	1	696 770	1	696 776	1	696 795	1	696 806	1	696 809	1	696 813	1	696 820	1	696 826	2	696 827	1	696 870	1	696 879	1	696 883	1	696 981	1	696 986	1	696 1004	1	696 1035	1	696 1078	1	696 1089	1	696 1091	1	696 1207	1	696 1264	1	696 1297	1	696 1298	1	696 1303	1	696 1356	1	696 1364	1	696 1368	1	696 1370	1	696 1372	1	696 1373	1	696 1374	1	696 1375	1	696 1376	1	696 1377	1	696 1396	1	696 1396	1	696
